What to include

To help us help you faster, please include:

  • Student name (or parent name)
  • Course name (if applicable)
  • What you were trying to do + what happened
  • Device/browser (iPad, Mac, Chromebook, etc.)
  • Screenshot or link (optional)

We're a small family team, but we read every message.
